name: The Hill I Die On
description:
For the Game Jam Ludum Dare 50. 

Theme: Delay the inevitable

Story: You play as the samurai "Hiro". After a long war, he finds himself alone on a hill surrounded by enemies. His death is inevitable, but he won't go easy... 

Controls:

Click to the left or right of the Samurai to attack in that direction

Swipe to launch a projectile in that direction

Didn't have enough time to implement the energy meter (Swipe should take more effort/energy)... so you can go nuts killing blobs :) (also didn't have time to add more enemies lol).

If you want to see how this game was made (and other game/web development videos) subscribe to me on YouTube :D  https://www.youtube.com/c/jcode3
